name: Wolf Sheep Cabbage
description:
"Wolf Sheep Cabbage" is a casual puzzle game where a single directional move affects all units simultaneously. Wolves eat sheep, sheep eat cabbage. Use your wits to safely deliver the wolf, sheep, and cabbage to their designated locations!


Deliver the wolf, sheep, and cabbage to the destination simultaneously


Fences can protect the little sheep!


Beware of sharp traps!


Feel the anger of the little sheep!


Endless fun with teleportation gates!
